content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Maryam, I'm glad we're talking about the rental price. I want to get the highest price possible for my apartment. How much are you willing to pay? Remember, this is a newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center, close to all important facilities.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand, Mister Schmidt. Considering the apartment's condition and location, I would like to offer 500 euros per month.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: That's a low offer, Maryam. I want more money for my apartment. Remember, it's a newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center, close to all important facilities. I'm looking for a higher price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understood. How about 550 euros per month? It's a fair price for the apartment's condition and location.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: 550 euros is still not enough, Maryam. Remember, it's a newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center, close to all important facilities. I'm looking for a higher price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Alright, Mister Schmidt. How about 600 euros per month? It's a reasonable price for the apartment's condition and location.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: 600 euros is closer to my expectations, Maryam. Remember, it's a newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center, close to all important facilities. But I'm still hoping for a higher price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand, Mister Schmidt. How about 650 euros per month? It's a good price for the apartment's condition and location.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: 650 euros is a good offer, Maryam. Remember, it's a newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center, close to all important facilities. I'm willing to accept this price. However, the final price is 675 euros per month. Is that acceptable for you?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I see, Mister Schmidt. I agree to the price of 675 euros per month!
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I agree to the price of [675] Euro!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
